title: Why don't you delete dominion already just like what you did to TB?
body:
Since you give zero fuck to dominion players.
My two posts yesterday got completely ignored.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/ikuceajW-imagine-keep-getting-completely-new-players-as-teammates-70-of-the-time-after-you-played-200-games

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/4hA2Uq52-dominion-matchup-system-is-broken

replies.body:
>My two posts yesterday got completely ignored.

Because there's nothing to be said. You're presumably hovering around entry-level MMR if you're getting completely new players. Experience (via number of games) is important, but skill level (via MMR) is often more useful for matching players.

Give up, not enough people play dominion. It feels like there is only about 2k players that actually play that mode consistently. I used to play it a lot in season 3. I haven't since then though. Not because I don't enjoy it, I do, it's just that it's not popular among my friends. Honestly riot should probably just take it out and replace it with something else. TT on the other hand I could care less what happens to it. That mode is far more boring than dominion is. If they had a ranked version of dominion I would play hands down. I feel your pain but it's a lost cause dude.

There are still a lot of dominion players, enough to form a match within 3 mins.
But I'd rather have long que than playing with people who have no idea what they are doing.
